title: Be more consistent with numbers in search pattern input
body: When entering a value from a BUG_CHECK It is common sense to enter the entire Hex value of a field in an event report. When a search comes up empty it is not always apparent that the problem was leading zeroes. How about having the search engine recognize strings that are hex numbers and asking if the requester would like values without leading zeroes also included.   It would also be nice if there was an option to only get numerical values that matched the one being searched and not every single number that is preceded by a "0x"
